kiss.midnightconfig.title: KISS Config
net.manu_faktur.kiss.name: Keep Inventory Sorted, Simple
kiss.midnightconfig.displaySortButtonPla: Display separate sort button for player inventory
kiss.midnightconfig.alsoSortPlayerInvent:
When sorting a non-player inventory via button or hotkey,
the player inventory will also be sorted.
kiss.midnightconfig.deprecatedNote:
Sort buttons are deprecated and might get removed in a future version.
Use hotkey-activation instead. Hotkeys can be configured in Options -> Controls -> Key Binds.
net.manu_faktur.kiss.sorting.invalid: Not looking at a valid inventory
kiss.midnightconfig.enum.SortType.NAME: Name
